meanings.definition: Covered in or made of wool
meanings.sent1: The sheep had the wooliest coat in the flock.
meanings.sent2: Her sweater was the wooliest I had ever felt.
meanings.sent3: The wooliest blanket kept me warm on the coldest night.
meanings.sent4: The wooliest clouds floated lazily across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The wooliest socks kept my feet cozy during winter.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of wooly, having the most wool
meanings.sent1: The wooliest sheep won first prize at the fair.
meanings.sent2: His hat was the wooliest of all the hats in the store.
meanings.sent3: The wooliest teddy bear looked like it needed a haircut.
meanings.sent4: The wooliest scarf wrapped snugly around her neck.
meanings.sent5: The wooliest caterpillar crawled slowly along the branch.

meanings.definition: Most fuzzy or soft like wool
meanings.sent1: The kitten's fur was the wooliest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The blanket was the wooliest and comfiest on the couch.
meanings.sent3: The wooliest sweater made her look like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: The wooliest pillow felt like a dream to rest on.
meanings.sent5: The wooliest bunny hopped around the garden happily.
